Roblox Indie Game Development.description: Developed a high-class game amongst a small indie game development studio. Written using Lua+u and with 3D models designed in Blender.

Fluid Physics Simulation.description: An experiment written using C++ in the Processing engine that simulates realistic soft and hard bodies.

Frontend Web Development.description: An experiment written using C++ in the Processing engine that simulates realistic soft and hard bodies.

p5.js Boid Flocking Simulation.description: 2D visual art depicting simple yet dynamically fascinating flocking behaviors in the medium of p5.js rendering.
